subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Monuments and Memorials
lead_paragraph: Barbaro, who won the 2006 Kentucky Derby and broke down two weeks later at the Preakness, will have his ashes interred at Churchill Downs. He was euthanized Jan. 29, 2007. The site will include a bronze statue commissioned by Barbaro’s owners, Roy and Gretchen Jackson. The statue will be loaned to the track.
